org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Interface ComplementConstructionInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComplementConstructionInterface, ClassicComplementInterface, DeterministicComplementInterface, KurshanComplementInterface, ModifiedSafraComplementInterface, MullerSchuppComplementInterface, PitermanComplementInterface, RamseyComplementInterface, RankComplementInterface, SafraComplementInterface, SliceComplementInterface, WAAComplementInterface, WAPAComplementInterface

    public interface ComplementConstructionInterface
    This interface is used to extend the complementation constructions available in ComplementExpression. Note that the command-line options -m, -o, -s, and -t will be captured by ComplementExpression and will not be passed to getOptions(Context, List). To make a complementation construction available in ComplementExpression, an object of this interface must be added to CommandRepository via CommandRepository.addComplementConstructionInterface(ComplementConstructionInterface) . If the interface object provides the default construction for a type of automata, it should be added by CommandRepository.addComplementConstructionInterface(ComplementConstructionInterface, org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonType) . When a complement command, which corresponds to an object of ComplementExpression, is executed, it will try to find in CommandRepository an object of this interface with the name specified by the -m option. Depending on what constructors are available, the complementation construction of the class getConstructionClass() will be instantiated by passing to the constructor one or two of the following objects.
    1. The automaton to be complemented.
    2. The complementation options obtained by passing command-line options other than -m, -o, -s, -t, and the automaton to be complemented to getOptions(Context, List).
    The constructor taking the automaton to be complemented and the complementation options has higher priority than the constructor taking only the automaton to be complemented.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
